TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中, 当切换到设计器视图 (如 visual Studio 中的**设计**视图) 时, 将分析控件标记。In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as **Design** view in Visual Studio), the control markup is parsed. 然后, 在设计图面上创建该控件的设计时版本。A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface. 切换到 "源" 视图时, 设计时控件将作为网页的标记保存。When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as the markup for the Web page. 类在可视化设计器中为控件提供设计时支持。 The class provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

para.span: 若要在设计时为 "操作列表" 菜单提供派生类中的命令, 必须重写属性。

span.span: To provide commands in a derived class for the action list menu at design time, you must override the property.

para.span: 对于此属性, 返回一个自定义对象, 该对象包含从对象派生的项。

span.span: For this property, return a custom object that contains items that derive from the object.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 类。

span.span: For more information, see the class.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取项的列表，其中的项用来在设计时创建操作列表菜单。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含操作列表项的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the action list items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 方法是否可被设计宿主调用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以调用 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关联 的控件的属性实现了接口, 则可以调用方法。 The method can be called if the property of the associated control implements the interface. 在这种情况下 , 属性值`true`为。In that case, the property value is `true`. 如果属性为`true`, 则 "**配置数据源**" 菜单项将显示在可视化设计器图面上关联控件的 " **LinqDataSource 任务**" 菜单中。 If the property is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface. 选择此项时, 将启动 "**配置数据源**" 向导。When this item is selected, the **Configure Data Source** wizard is started.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 方法是否可被设计宿主调用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called by the design host.

value.span: 如果可以调用 方法，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method can be called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下所有条件, 则可以调用方法:The method can be called if all the following conditions are true: - 关联 控件的属性实现接口。The property of the associated control implements the interface. - 属性包含一个值。The property contains a value. 如果这些条件为 true, 则属性值为。 `true`If these conditions are true, the property value is `true`. 如果 为`true`, 则 "**刷新架构**" 菜单项将显示在可视化设计器图面上关联控件的 " **LinqDataSource 任务**" 菜单中。If the is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 在设计宿主中启动数据源配置向导。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration wizard in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在可视化设计器图面上启动 "**配置数据源**" 向导。 The method starts the **Configure Data Source** wizard on the visual designer surface. 当在关联控件的"LinqDataSource任务"菜单上选择"配置数据源"菜单项时,将调用方法。 The method is called when the **Configure Data Source** menu item is selected on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu of the associated control. 当属性为`true`时, "**配置数据源**" 菜单项将出现在 " **LinqDataSource 任务**" 菜单上。The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the **LinqDataSource Tasks** menu when the property is `true`.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 获取或设置包含属性（其值包含要检索的数据）的类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the property whose value has the data that you want to retrieve.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Delete { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Delete : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置删除操作的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实例中, 设置此属性不起作用。In a instance, setting this property has no effect. 此属性隐藏关联控件中的属性, 仅供内部使用。This property shadows a property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

value.span: 如果为关联的 实例的用户启用了删除操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the delete operation is enabled for users of the associated instance; otherwise, .

param.name: preferSilent
param.span: 表示取消所有数据源事件，直到刷新架构为止。

span.span: to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.

summary.span: 刷新基础数据源的架构。

span.span: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 为时`true`, 设计宿主才调用方法。The design host calls the method only if is `true`.
